docs.text: SKC - Simple Kubernettes Client For Linux based systems run the scripts in order in .init-scripts/nix 1-init-venv.sh 2-install-wxpython.sh For Windows systems run the scripts in order in .init-scripts\win 1-init-venv.bat 2-install-wxpython.bat Either way you now be able to run the main.py file, which shows a frame: python main.py
docs.title: SKC - Simple Kubernettes Client

docs.text: For Linux based systems run the scripts in order in .init-scripts/nix 1-init-venv.sh 2-install-wxpython.sh For Windows systems run the scripts in order in .init-scripts\win 1-init-venv.bat 2-install-wxpython.bat Either way you now be able to run the main.py file, which shows a frame: python main.py
